trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a discovery document.
This class cannot be inherited.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given an URL.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 검색 URL을 지정 된 사용 가능한 XML 웹 서비스를 검색 하는 작업이 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 URL은 일반적으로.disco 인 파일 이름 확장명이 검색 문서를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas, or other discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서는 있는 경우에 대 한 정보를 서비스 설명, XML 스키마 정의 언어 (XSD) 스키마 또는 기타 검색 문서와 같은 XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 참조를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 검색 문서에 대 한 참조를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class.
Reference to a discovery document.
The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref" /> property is set to the value of <c>href</c>.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref" /> property to the value of <paramref name="href" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> 속성을 <paramref name="href" />의 값으로 설정하여 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 참조된 검색 문서를 저장할 때 사용할 기본 파일의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document to a file.
trans-unit.target: 참조된 문서를 파일에 저장할 때 사용할 기본 파일의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the referenced discovery document as a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 참조된 검색 문서의 콘텐츠를 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> 개체로서 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> representing the contents of the referenced discovery document.

If the discovery document has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.
trans-unit.target: 경우 검색 문서 되지 다운로드 되어에 추가 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> 속성 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, 다운로드 하 고 문서를 확인 하려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
An error occurred during the download or resolution of the XSD schema using <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" />을 사용하여 XSD 스키마를 다운로드하거나 확인하는 동안 오류가 발생한 경우

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the discovery document.
Reads and returns the discovery document from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 전달된 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />에서 검색 문서를 읽고 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
Gets or sets the reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서에 대한 참조를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Reference to a discovery document.
For most references, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property is a URL, such as http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 참조에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> 와 같은 속성은 URL 이며 http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco합니다.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that all referenced documents within the discovery document are valid.
trans-unit.target: 모든 참조된 문서가 해당 검색 문서 내에 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unless you specifically need to resolve the individual references of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> object, you should invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.
trans-unit.target: 특히의 개별 참조를 확인할 필요가 없다면 한 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> 개체를 호출 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> 의 메서드 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all references to discovery documents, XSD schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> and any references found in referring discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서, XSD 스키마, 및에서 서비스 설명에 대 한 모든 참조를 확인 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> 속성 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> 및 검색 문서에 대 한 모든 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The discovery document could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
trans-unit.target: 검색 문서를 다운로드하고 확인할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 참조된 검색 문서의 URL을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the referenced discovery document.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> to write into <c>stream</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> into which the serialized discovery document is written.
Writes the passed <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
